this game does not support vertical monitors if you play on a vertical monitor the only allowed resolutions will be vertical which is not only a terrible experience but it breaks the ui so the game is not playable  this is disappointing as clearly a lot of work has gone into this game and it would take very little effort to allow arbitrary resolutions to be set or even better allow the window to be resizable
